title: Un Punto Macrobiotico
typeOfFood: Vegan-friendly, Italian, Macrobiotic, Organic, Take-out, Non-veg
description: Serves meat, veg options available. A wholefood restaurant that offers a daily vegan set menu with soup, plate of greens legumes and grain, plus salad and tea; sometimes it's gluten-free. Also has coffee ersatz and vegan desserts. Also a small shop selling whole and organic food, pizza and bread dough, and sourdough. Occasionally opens for dinner on Wed, Fri or Sat 7-9pm (call ahead to check if any vegan food).
